Articles.Content: Absolutely! I'll be using my Wyvren to fight, just finished strutting it up in the spaceplane hangar. Lets say 100Km orbit if we can manage?

Absolutely! I'll be using my Wyvren to fight, just finished strutting it up in the spaceplane hangar. Lets say 100Km orbit if we can manage?

How many parts does it have because my computer might die if its in that low of an orbit. I would prefer 250km but if you cant get it that high its okay.
It's a mid-300 part ship, and I think I can get it up there. I just ran into some problems with the launch stage (I made the Wyvren in the SPH), but I've almost got it up!
This thread is dying.

This thread is dying.

Yeah ... I'm trying to build a cruiser/corvette but they keep turning out like fat turtles. :/

Yeah ... I'm trying to build a cruiser/corvette but they keep turning out like fat turtles. :/

I'm willing to battle someone while jabbernewt is setting his stuff up. I may have a 1-2 day delay because I getting a new computer and christmas is in 19 minutes.
Merry Christmas.

Also I have watched videos and tried to rendezvous but I cant do it without MechJeb :/ Guess im just dumb. MERRY CHRISTMAS HOHOHO

I'm willing to battle someone while jabbernewt is setting his stuff up. I may have a 1-2 day delay because I getting a new computer and christmas is in 19 minutes.

Dying thread is dying.
everything is dying, everyone is on holiday...

I only celebrate Kristmas.

Well it was fun while it lasted. I am now in the full grasp of playing with mods. Its like a blackhole once you enter the modded domain there's no coming back.

No,there is.
I gotta admit, That's kinda what happened to me.

I crawled my way out of there.

I have developed a competitive turn-based game system for Kerbal Space Program, combat included.

Now I need beta testers.

Hey guys! Look i made a .5 meter missile that can do this! I now cannot say the Drek is impervious to all .5m rounds.

The cute little missile! It's doubleconcussion (two part)
Reminds me of my original two stage prototype missile... which exploded in a spectacular catastrophe. Srbs all the way. :)
Hmm, maybe a revival battle is an order, Anyone wanna do a battle?
